name: NeighborhoodConnectedImageFilter

members.name: Lower
members.detaileddescriptionSet: Set/Get the lower threshold. The default is 0.
members.detaileddescriptionGet: Set/Get the lower threshold. The default is 0.

members.name: Upper
members.detaileddescriptionSet: Set/Get the upper threshold. The default is the largest possible value for the InputPixelType.
members.detaileddescriptionGet: Set/Get the upper threshold. The default is the largest possible value for the InputPixelType.

members.name: Radius
members.doc: Radius of the neighborhood used to compute the median
members.detaileddescriptionSet: Set the radius of the neighborhood used for a mask.
members.detaileddescriptionGet: Get the radius of the neighborhood used to compute the median

members.name: ReplaceValue
members.doc:
Pixels that lie within Lower and Upper (inclusive)
       will be replaced with this value. The default is 1.
members.detaileddescriptionSet: Set/Get value to replace thresholded pixels. Pixels that lie * within Lower and Upper (inclusive) will be replaced with this value. The default is 1.
members.detaileddescriptionGet: Set/Get value to replace thresholded pixels. Pixels that lie * within Lower and Upper (inclusive) will be replaced with this value. The default is 1.

briefdescription: Label pixels that are connected to a seed and lie within a neighborhood.
detaileddescription: NeighborhoodConnectedImageFilter labels pixels with ReplaceValue that are connected to an initial Seed AND whose neighbors all lie within a Lower and Upper threshold range.
